greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Reading the first row of this array or its successive antidiagonals is the same as reading this sequence.
comment: The array is always extended by its antidiagonals with the smallest term not yet present that doesn't lead to a contradiction. The sequence is thus the lexicographically earliest of its kind.
xref: Cf. A325783 and A325785 where the same idea is developed.
results.author: _Eric Angelini_, May 21 2019
